faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about Clockwise

questions.multipleProjects: Can I book hours on multiple projects in one day?
questions.description: What should I fill in for description/notes?
questions.statuses: What do the statuses Pending / Approved / Rejected mean?
questions.viewHours: Where can I view my hours per week or month?
questions.approved: How do I see if my hours have been approved?
questions.vacationDays: How many vacation days do I have left?
questions.modifyVacation: Can I modify or withdraw a vacation request?
questions.login: I can't log in, what should I do?
questions.missingProject: A project is missing from the list, what now?
questions.slowSystem: The system is slow or doesn't load properly.

answers.howToRegister: Go to 'Register Hours', select a project and fill in your hours. Click Save.
answers.multipleProjects: Yes, you can add multiple entries and distribute your hours across the correct projects.
answers.description: Write briefly what you did, for example: 'administration', 'project X' or 'training'.
answers.editHours: Yes, as long as they haven't been approved yet. This can be done via 'Hours Overview'.
answers.statuses: Pending means your manager still needs to review. Approved is final. Rejected means you need to adjust and resubmit.
answers.rejected: Usually because the wrong project was selected or times don't match. Adjust according to your manager's comment.
answers.viewHours: Go to 'Hours Overview' and filter by week or month to see your total hours.
answers.export: If export is enabled, you can download your hours as PDF or Excel in 'Hours Overview'.
answers.approved: The overview shows the status per day or entry. Approved means it's finalized.
answers.requestVacation: Open 'Vacation', select your period and click Request. Your manager will receive a notification.
answers.vacationDays: At the top of the 'Vacation' page you can see how many days you have available.
answers.modifyVacation: Yes, as long as the request hasn't been approved yet you can modify or withdraw it.
answers.login: Check your email address and password or use 'Forgot password'. If it doesn't work, contact HR/admin.
answers.missingProject: Report this to your manager or admin so the project can be added.
answers.slowSystem: Try a hard refresh (Ctrl+F5) or a different browser. If the problem persists, report it to support.
